nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: Because the test expected an exception which is not thrown any more when ObjecReference#System/System_Instance is not set.

nodes.bodyText:
Same as above. but should be deleted not commented.
Because the test expected an exception which is not thrown any more when ObjecReference#System/System_Instance is not set.
